channel.title: Women Techmakers Galicia 2020 - 28th March, La Coruña
channel.description: Women Techmakers Galicia is coming to Vigo on the 28th March 2020. We are currently looking for sponsors. Join us to help make the Galician tech scene a more diverse place.

item.title: Call for Papers
item.description:
Women Techmakers Galicia will be held 10th of March in the city of Vigo. If you want to be part of this great event as a speaker you are in luck!

Please submit your proposals here.

Deadline is February 10th, 2018

Please note: There is no guarantee that a submission will be put onto the conference agenda!

The program committee picks the most interesting talk proposals and informs the selected submitters until February 15, 2018.

Any questions?

Email organizers at info@gdgvigo.com

item.title: Call for sponsors
item.description:
We’re very excited - not just because of the inordinate amount of caffeine based products consumed - but also because our team are putting together the final missing parts to the biggest tech event in Galicia

This year event will take place in Vigo - Spain.

We couldn’t make these events happen without the help of our amazing sponsors, so why not help us out this year and show the community that you support diversity!

Sponsor us now.
